attributes.action: Make schools finish around end of june At the end of the 2022 2023 School year
attributes.additional_details: Most Students around UK are feeling depressed because they cant go on holidays like other teenagers all around the world. No body wants to learn or go to school for the last month because They know that other teenagers are traveling but they can’t. We would like to be equal with other teenagers and have more holidays. Please make our summer holidays longer
attributes.background: Schools all around europe usually finish about the end of June but Students in UK has to wait until end of july. We would like to go to holidays and enjoy our summer more. Most countries have around 9-10 weeks of holiday but UK only has 6 weeks holiday. Please  Make the summer holidays longer

rejection.details:
The UK Government is only responsible for schools in England, so we could only accept a petition calling for schools in England to be required to close in June.

Decisions about closing schools early in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland would be a matter for the Scottish Government, Welsh Government and Northern Ireland Executive.
